metadata.description: This MCU guidebook delves into the past of S.H.I.E.L.D.! Our comprehensive coverage of the fan-favorite Marvel Studios films and Marvel Television shows continues as we profile Agent Peggy Carter's 1940s organization, the SSR! Featuring fact sheets, show-to-comic comparisons, and behind-the-scenes production art and stills, this fantastic book is packed with profiles and updates on Agent Carter, Edwin Jarvis, Chief Roger Dooley, Agent Daniel Sousa, Agent Jack Thompson, the Howling Commandos, Angie Martinelli, Dottie Underwood, Johann Fennhoff, Leviathan, Howard Stark and more! Relive the thrills of Marvel's Agent Carter Season One right here, and continue building your indispensable library of Marvel Cinematic Universe reference books!
metadata.name: Guidebook to the Marvel Cinematic Universe - Marvel's Agent Carter Season One
